sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id AS dataset_id FROM ErythronDB.Dataset

sqlQuery.name: Datasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT investigation_id AS dataset_id, dataset_id AS child_dataset_id, '@PROJECT_ID@'::text AS project_id, category, taxon, dataset_name, dataset_summary, is_public, 'coming soon' AS highlight FROM ErythronDB.Dataset ORDER BY dataset_id, child_dataset_id

sqlQuery.name: Searches
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT i.source_id AS dataset_id, '@PROJECT_ID@'::text AS project_id, CASE WHEN r.target_name = 'GeneDataset.DifferentialExpression' THEN i.source_id || '_comparison' WHEN r.target_name = 'GeneDataset.RankedExpression' THEN i.source_id || '_expression' ELSE i.source_id || '_comparison' END AS search_name, CASE WHEN r.target_name = 'GeneDataset.DifferentialExpression' AND i.source_id = 'study001' THEN 'Compare erythroid cell stages within and across lineages' WHEN r.target_name = 'GeneDataset.DifferentialExpression' AND i.source_id != 'study001' THEN 'Compare Epo challenged cells to controls' WHEN r.target_name = 'GeneDataset.RankedExpression' THEN 'Get genes by ranked expression level' ELSE 'Compare EPO challenged cells to controls' END AS search_display_name FROM Study.Study i, Study.Study d, CBIL.DatasetModelRef r WHERE d.investigation_id = i.study_id AND r.dataset_id = d.study_id ORDER BY dataset_id, search_name
